doc.field: Arthur H. Landis Oral History Collection
Arthur H. Landis Oral History Collection

Klein, Herman; Charles Nusser; Max Robert Klonsky; and Harold Smilth. Smith, commander of battalion headquarters company on the staff structure and events surrounding the loss of Lardner; Nusser or Klonsky on issues concerning the publication of Landis's book.
